Text.Page:
It would be nice to treat these hard-working people to a little luxury for all their help, but we're down to rations and hardtack.

I know Halwyn has been exploring the shipwrecks. Would you mind asking her if she's found anything better in there?

As luck would have it, yes!

Well, that is to say, yes, we found a lovely stash of wine onboard. But before we could recover it, we were overrun by undead monsters.

Look, I'm not a coward, but I'm not staring down those drowned gula bastards for some wine...no matter how delicious and fancy and well-balanced...

, you could get the wine, right? For Dyfed and her volunteers, I mean.
(The barrel is empty and so are the wine bottles. The labels read, "One ration per officer." Perhaps the drowned gula officers have full bottles on them...)

Wonderful...I mean, I'll take these straight to Dyfed and the volunteers. They'll be really pleased by the surprise.

Here, take this for your troubles.
Don't worry. I'm sure you can pry the wine from those gula sailors' hands.
